attributes.action: We want a immediate jail sentence for anyone with child abuse photographs.
attributes.additional_details:
Cumbrians against peadophiles
 We want a immediate jail sentence for anyone with child abuse photographs, we want them named and photos in the papers and we want an investigation into why these people are never jailed at Carlisle Crown Court.
 Our children need protected.
